00018 #include <stdio.h>
00019 #include <string>
00020 #include "growriter.h"
00021 
00022 
00023 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 void GROWriter::Open(string file, bool bAppend)
00028 {
00029     _out = fopen(file.c_str(), bAppend ? "at" : "wt");
00030 }
00031 
00032 void GROWriter::Close()
00033 {
00034     fclose(_out);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void GROWriter::Write(Topology *conf)
00038 {
00039     char format[100];
00040   int  i,resnr,l,vpr;
00041   Topology *top = conf;
00042 
00043   fprintf (_out,"%s\n","what a nice title");
00044   fprintf (_out,"%5d\n",top->BeadCount());
00045   
00046   bool v = false; // we don't write velocities!  
00047   int pr = 3; // precision of writeout
00048   
00049   /* build format string for printing, 
00050      something like "%8.3f" for x and "%8.4f" for v */
00051   /*if (pr<0)
00052     pr=0;
00053   if (pr>30)
00054     pr=30;*/
00055   l=pr+5;
00056   vpr=pr+1;
00057   if (v)
00058     sprintf(format,"%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df\n",
00059             l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,vpr,l,vpr,l,vpr);
00060   else
00061     sprintf(format,"%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df\n",l,pr,l,pr,l,pr);
00062   
00063   for (i=0; i< top->BeadCount(); i++) {
00064     resnr=top->getBead(i)->getResnr();
00065     string resname = top->getResidue(resnr)->getName();
00066     string atomname = top->getBead(i)->getName();
00067     
00068     fprintf(_out,"%5d%-5.5s%5.5s%5d",
00069             (resnr+1)%100000,resname.c_str(),atomname.c_str(),(i+1)%100000);
00070     /* next fprintf uses built format string */
00071     vec r = conf->getBead(i)->getPos();
00072     vec vv = vec(0,0,0);
00073     
00074     if (v)
00075       fprintf(_out,format,
00076               r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), vv.getX(), vv.getY(), vv.getZ());
00077     else
00078       fprintf(_out,format,
00079               r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ());
00080   }
00081 
00082   // write the boy
00083   matrix box = conf->getBox();
00084   
00085   if (pr<5) 
00086     pr=5;
00087   l=pr+5;
00088   
00089   if (box[0][1] || box[0][2] || box[1][0] || box[1][2] ||
00090       box[2][0] || box[2][1]) {
00091     sprintf(format,"%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df"
00092             "%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df\n",
00093             l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr,l,pr);
00094     fprintf(_out,format,
00095             box[0][0],box[1][1],box[2][2],
00096             box[0][1],box[0][2],box[1][0],
00097             box[1][2],box[2][0],box[2][1]);
00098   } else {
00099     sprintf(format,"%%%d.%df%%%d.%df%%%d.%df\n",l,pr,l,pr,l,pr);
00100     fprintf(_out,format,
00101             box[0][0],box[1][1],box[2][2]);
00102   }
00103   fflush(_out);
00104 }
00105 
00106 }}
